title: EOD Update
text:

title: EOD Update
text:
May 29:
• Issue in Settings > Location:
An unexpected error occurred in the Settings > Location section, which triggered the Suspense fallback component.
• Abnormal Behavior in User Information:
In the User Information section, the gender field contains an unexpected value such as 3.
• Finding the root cause so that i can solve it.

title: EOD Update
text:
May 30
• I tried to solve the issue and proposed the solution that worked locally. but I was not assigned to it.

title: EOD Update
text:
